am_hal_rtc.h File Reference

Functions for interfacing and accessing the Real-Time Clock (RTC). More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Data Structures

struct  am_hal_rtc_time_struct
 The basic time structure used by the HAL for RTC interaction. More...
 

Macros

OSC Start and Stop

OSC Start and Stop defines.

OSC Start and Stop defines to be used with am_hal_clkgen_osc_x().

#define AM_HAL_RTC_OSC_XT   0x0
 
RTC Interrupts

Macro definitions for RTC interrupt status bits.

These macros correspond to the bits in the RTC interrupt status register. They may be used with any of the am_hal_rtc_int_x() functions.

#define AM_HAL_RTC_INT_ALM   RTC_INTEN_ALM_Msk
 
RTC Alarm Repeat Interval.

Macro definitions for the RTC alarm repeat interval.

These macros correspond to the RPT bits in the RTCCTL register. They may be used with the am_hal_rtc_alarm_interval_set() function.

Note: AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_10TH and AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_100TH do not correspond to the RPT bits but are used in conjunction with setting the ALM100 bits in the ALMLOW register.

#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_DIS   0x0
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_YR   0x1
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_MTH   0x2
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_WK   0x3
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_DAY   0x4
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_HR   0x5
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_MIN   0x6
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_SEC   0x7
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_10TH   0x8
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_100TH   0x9
 
RTC Alarm 100 Interval.

Macro definitions for the RTC alarm ms intervals.

These macros are used inside the am_hal_rtc_alarm_interval_set function when 10ms and 100ms repeated alarm intervals are desired.

#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM100_DEFAULT   0x00
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM100_10TH   0xF0
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM100_100TH   0xFF
